data.title: The Prometheus Deception by Ludlum, Robert: Very Good Hardcover (2000) First Edition.
data.meta_description: ISBN: 9780312253462 - First Edition. - Hardcover - St Martins Press - 2000 - Condition: Very Good - Very Good - Type: Hardback First Edition. Hardcover Book and Dust Jacket in Very Good Condition. 509 pages. Binding of clean and unmarked black full cloth with red titles, tight and solid, with rubbing to bottom edges. Internals in Fine Condition. Unclipped, glossy jacket is quite clean with a touch of corner wear to upper corners. A Ludlum spy thriller. 509 pages. 2000, St. Masrtin's Press, USA - The Prometheus Deception
